Title: Programming Foundation
ShortDescription: This is a 'zero-to-hero' started programming class which covers basics to complex algorithms.

Title: Data Structures & Algorithms
ShortDescription: A course which guides you to learn the commonly asked data structures and algorithms to rock your next algorithm interview.

Title: Frontcamp (ReactJS)
ShortDescription: Complete guide for you to become an expert React JS Developer. Learn HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, ES6, React JS and jQuery.

Title: Backcamp (NodeJS)
ShortDescription: This is a complete backend course in NodeJS stack. Master Express, MongoDB and many others. Build powerful RESTful APIs.

Title: Mobilecamp (Flutter)
ShortDescription: Taking this amazing course, create cross-platform Flutter apps for any screen with beautiful UI.

Title: Dotnetcamp (Full-stack bootcamp)
ShortDescription: Learn this powerful .NET framework to develop anything you want such as Web, Mobile, Game Development, IoT and more.

Title: Datacamp (Data Science, AI, Machine Learning)
ShortDescription: Data Collecting, Processing, Analysis, Visualization. Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning and more. Let them decide for you!.

Title: iOScamp (iOS with SwiftUI)
ShortDescription: Learn developing iOS apps taking this exciting course. Discover the magic of SwiftUI.

Title: Animation (Motion Graphics)
ShortDescription: This is a course for you to learn motion graphics from beginner to advanced level mastering Photoshop, Premiere Pro, After Effects and other tools.
Tags: After Effects, Premiere Pro, Motion, Animation

Title: 3D Modeling (3ds Max/Blender)
ShortDescription: Learn to create, edit, analyze 3d models for movies, animations, video games from professionals.

Title: UI/UX
ShortDescription: Learn to create user-friendly and fascinating designs.
Tags: UI, UX, Design, Adobe XD, Figma

Title: Scratch & Logic
ShortDescription: Learn programming in a fun way. Develop computational thinking, creativity, and problem-solving skills!

Title: Arduino & Robotechnics
ShortDescription: Learn to code. Understand circuit flows. Boost creativity. Build your own robots!

Title: Python Kids
ShortDescription: This course enables the children to be growing up with love towards programming.
